scripts.clean-js: npx replace "import { LitElement, html } from '../node_modules/@polymer/lit-element/lit-element.js';" "" dist/todo-input.js dist/todo-item.js
scripts.concat-js: npx concat-cli -f dist/my-todo.js dist/todo-input.js dist/todo-item.js -o dist/bundle_tmp.js
scripts.build: npm run minify-html && npm run copy-js && npm run clean-js && npm run concat-js && npm run rollup && npm run minify-js
scripts.postbuild: cd dist && rm bundle_tmp.js && rm my-todo.js && rm todo-input.js && rm todo-item.js
